speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I was not present to cast my votes on rollcall votes 133, 134, and 135 earlier today, March 9, 2007. Had I been present, I would have voted "aye" on the Baker Amendment--rollcall 133, "aye" on the Motion to Recommit--rollcall 134, and "nay" on Final Passage of H.R. 720--rollcall 135.
